_route: (==) Blood Moon: The BM shrine is its own branch. This document shows it as Shrine 99. However, based on your tempo, you can place it anywhere, ideally before a warp that is during night.

(==) Directions are generally for WB unless specified otherwise. Look on the map if you are not sure where to BLSS to or where a shrine is. For Square-First windbombs without direction, it means you aim at the thing you want to go to (look at map or watch VOD if you don't know where it is)
(==) Other terminology: TS = Turn Super, DT = Delayed Turn, SQ = Square First

FDC down.notes: You have to unequip the tree branch really fast. For safety you can also just run down to the flint, in which case you can probably skip the tree branch and get boomerang in castle

_Equipment::Bow<Bow + Arrow>.notes: Need all 5 arrows starting IST. You can grab extra ancient parts and sell them at the hateno shop before IST to buy arrows if you need.

_Shrine::OwaDaim.notes: We are grabbing hammer later in Hateno. Go for stasis wb if you want

Plateau.notes: [Defeat Ganon] Main Quest and [Seek Out Impa] Main Quest

BLSS to Satori.notes: From window toward beetle tree area

_Material<2 Razorshrooms>.notes: The 2 are in the exact same spot near some sunshrooms. Keep all of them

_Material<4 Endura Carrots>.notes: 1 for food or back up rupee item. Keep 3 for IST

_Korok::R60.notes: Throw a bomb to blow up the leaves right after exiting the shrine

_Material<3 Wood 10 Durians>.notes: Use bombs to farm them. 8-9 durians should be enough but you might want to grab extra food to be safe. Keep 3 wood and durian for IST

Hateno: (==) We are going to cycle materials later. If you have more than 3 wood or more than 4 rushroom or more than 2 razor shroom. Drop them now. .link([Example inventory after Satori]https://ist.itntpiston.app/?c=H4sIAAAAAAACA02OQQ7CMAwEv7IP4FAoSFx4CeLgNC6NlMbFSSji9bilElwszXrX65BCwR5FmeGUUjcY0Ytt5olJr%2FyoYbqtFnpyZIWT%2Baf2opwL%2FMxx2%2BEEUv33TFJi8F%2FeIYaeL23TrOkY0lJPo7PwAUpv0TyoyGhnopSacYTWTTqCk69K3VJQcIZBoIQWs4hfXo5U2Gyizuhurawfr2KlfeIAAAA%3D)

Enter Guard Chamber.notes: Go for unloaded gate but can clip in

Royal Claymore + RGC.notes: Do the sneakstrike like any% but don't shoot the moblin

Kill Lizalfos.notes: Throw a bomb to lure it like in any%

Hateno: (==) Material Cycling. Hard save before wb to be safe

Drop:.notes: Drop as you wait for the guardian to load
Drop as you wait for the stalker to die

_Material<Ancient Shaft>.notes: Need 1 shaft 1 spring. If the guardian only dropped a shaft, can kill others for a spring. Otherwise might be better off reloading. Also get a core if you can

_Material<Fairy>.notes: When arrived, pause to make the fairy load

_Shrine::KayaWan.notes: Can skip the core if you already got one from the guardian

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Impa>.notes: [Free the Divine Beasts] Main Quest and [Locked Mementos] Main Quest

_Npc<Hestu>.notes: [The Priceless Maracas] Side Quest. Talk Twice

_Shrine::MyahmAgana.notes: Activate shrine afterwards if got unloaded

Hateno: (==) IST START (.link([Simulator File]https://ist.itntpiston.app/?c=H4sIAAAAAAACA4VWy3LbNhTd8yvujBZtZ7SwJMudLLJQXDX1WK49ltMmk%2FECEi9FjEiABUAz7Nf34kWDjNt6I%2BJxn%2BecC89m8S%2BbwUPFDLIWslm6e7vdPsCvn3Y72HzeZic0sABtb9KvUYhwUEwcS1oVFRf2lH2zZ7pBpui3kabiOVxBg02DClagSyVlbS%2FWB1TODXvBij4PsoM1MKXo9xKkOtDhiaxRUSJ7ZqTiLoMlKPa3VMHRGippWk0Wqh18F1KhNpB3WEXPl4AibxWDo41AmV4ALTkTlFMnZU5WFJIiXTNtKhzV%2Fnj%2FZbOD693my9394xZ%2BxG9HbAyYEoELbjirQAtkZ20UP%2BNPmcJavmDaoNA6JXu6e6xYX1OGXyte4PvVu4uL5%2BHs1DKVDzfsdlLrAgTrc6qhYOJEeZNnjtR137MF1SlrVPaMEDCIlFbJscoz%2FKvlzZsRqM6jlGcLGObUN2oEEzkgM1nHTUlBfHuXQ3vHBPlovVEX9Xj7FyUbqIkn1OFKg5G0OCOUvCZ%2FLM9yex45MACQVOdvrEblJzkEJpasMJa7N9e38OmBrpuSi5OeW2iE9x6%2BUz8VIZw1%2FHiGtnkzeBIpSTJxEeM3isJRAjcF9LKFXIofDJTE50hkSiUGWoI%2BKuxcMzTxkqhDVw0KSQ7%2BRFNR3%2Bdwy85z%2BM1v%2ByBnwU%2Bl0aA7qWyeBeOqp9%2Bj5cfKkbZkGt5Bh6yRguQpzQSNTUFAwF3PyhF6BDIwSiRo036Gon%2BO2liMVeNRSRXrd7zMA82EVDXxzNUftr7XYzh4g6U0QCwp%2B2OFgC%2BoeocpHNB0SED6OWM56tHPReMy9zS1X2Od2x1fjGWrdN0vZUML%2Fh%2BgOYA0qckFn8Oh7ZNTxyhNFtl%2B88c2OyjSvh0orvUQdDOeLquQVshqSuzvRQausUkDwtCxsEf5DDM3jNKUwkEdA0sjc7ytx9p1vRW%2B7xaU%2BO2pRHPMiZX6JV0Yh6ir23Y9UDAGGgskmLpg65Do2ieauebaDAKWduUOolSmBqSPDw44w0xr2fGkWI70quyfNnev7vz83lm5uKFmqyZm2pk%2BGXEFV9rMQRKQxHvRk6l9ZhxylwGM8TjyQ5LXNF%2BtE9Vy87WWOS84qvfO87M3v5ooxhkuiRRVDid6EMSrmbsYzNaj7jmjOo4gfcYO1atdbSvsnx0IyxEIVGqrMVKPVOfKpd3uYPtXsUMQWfo0OYzS6ANDBt24nS4%2BDsNszGUnrN%2BFN1nGUTqw2EGziqNqOq73D483v3%2BE3Wb%2FFGqZUJbu3rdG078AIIsk%2BzcfsqCJ9A0c%2Fy8yGqSexuGhtrXGx%2Bq1eiuIGZzcyKDOF4Q8cbLh1cjONXiqqWEdhBSJfTXdmGgwnMZlOI0ytBkHLFx%2BrYkz0Jc%2B6X7yVoSHKlWjjisvsf%2BpSP9birZJaX6BCGMgh3IjTb3FP900M2KACgAA)). The file mainly shows the corruption details and may not reflect what you actually do. Please refer to the steps below

Cycle materials.notes:
Drop and pick up everything between flint and shaft. 
Reminder that if you have fewer than 5 arrows, you need to sell something extra to buy 5 arrows.
Also eat endura carrot and durian down to 3.
.!!(Important: If you got a core from the guardian, also drop and pick up the core so it's behind fairy)

Hold 5 items you have 2 of.notes: The 4 you dropped + lotus or rushroom

Sell the 5 Items.notes: If you forgot what you held, just sell everything you have 1 of, except for the core

Sell the 5 items.notes: Again you can sell everything but the core if you forgot what you held

Hateno: (==) RELOAD. Corruption in progress. Do not press dpad, press A on any item or close inventory once opened until next SAVE
(==) SAVE. (If you don't have full weapon tab, the slot breaking had failed and you need to close the game and restart)

_Cook<4 Lotus + Naydra Fang>.notes: You must cook speed food first

.!!(Combine cores and shafts).notes: If you bought arrow, you will have more than 4 shafts. In this case, drop extra shaft to get a single stack of 5 shafts

Camera.notes: [Robbie's Research] Side Quest and [Slated for Upgrades] Side Quest

Drop materials.notes: All Durians. Also Wood and Rushroom down to 1

Drop weapons.notes: Drop the 4 weapons other than the 2 claymores. Make sure Royal Claymore is before Royal Guard Claymore

Hateno: (==) RELOAD -> SAVE. Corruption in progress. Do not press dpad, press A on any item or close inventory once opened
(==) RELOAD -> SAVE. Corruption in progress. Do not press dpad, press A on any item or close inventory once opened

Drop materials.notes: Drop the 2 shaft from the first slot and drop the spring

_Npc<Horned Statue>.notes: [The Statue's Bargain] Side Quest. Just mash A. You will trade away a stam and get a heart

CLOSE + RELOAD AUTOSAVE.notes: Only if it's already after 5AM. If it's close (4:50AM), go to pot and wait until 5AM, then save, close and reload. If before 4:50AM, you can make morning, then talk to bolson until autosave, then close and reload.

Hateno: (==) Don't break lizal shield. Use Royal Claymore for tree cutting and stasis stuff. Use bow order is Swallow -> FDB. Use Falcon/GEB only when necessary (You will get these bows in the next section)

_Equipment::Bow<10 Arrows + Swallow Bow>.notes: Use swallow bow + AA for minigame

_Chest<Ancient Core>.notes: If you forget this one, there is a backup later in Ketoh Wawai (dark forest shrine)

_Chest<5 Shock Arrows>.notes: If you are slow you can AA the enemies so they don't bother you

BLSS .dir(W) + WB .dir(W) x2.notes: Lightning pedestal on cliff. Shoot with FDB

Melt Ice.notes: Shoot 3 fire arrows while running to the ice. Use 4th fire arrow to light 3 wood. Then light a normal arrow on fire to kill a wizrobe. If you need to set TOD, do it now and use the last fire arrow to relight the fire Start farming luminous stones around the shrine. After that put 3 more wood and you should have access to the shrine. Need to be 12:50 to 13:40 when exiting shrine

_Shrine::KuhTakkar.notes: Melt ice with piles of wood

_Material<Flint>.notes: If you already have an rng one from the luminous ores, can skip this one

BLSS .dir(W).notes: Toward single tree with a fire wizrobe. Kill it with ice rod

_Material<Electric Darner>.notes: Under pebble in water. Want to spam X + ZR to pull glider instantly and AA the lizalfos

_Npc<Friend 2>.notes: AA boko. If the boko with bow notices you, AA him as well.

_Npc<Friend 3>.notes: RGC slam ground. Don't slam boko since that takes extra durability

.dir(<<<S) Slight Turn.notes: Break the boxes and aim a bit left of a ladder in front of you

Talk a horse. Ride to horse guy.notes: Land near a boko on horse, run up to him, AA the boko and instantly get on the horse

Do Test of Will.notes: Combine stacks and bake an apple on phase 2

.dir(<W) + .dir(<<W) Turn.notes: can also BLSS but it's a bit monkaSTEER

.dir(W) kill some wolves.notes: Slam with Royal Claymore to kill 2 farthest

Kill .enemy(Kohga).notes: Phase 1: spam AA after screen goes out. Phase 2: wait for the ball to go above, shoot 2 AA, run over the hole, spam AA. Phase 3: Mag the ball to kohga from the side and press B as the ball goes over the edge of the hole. Or just do normal kill

_Shop<All Fire + Shock>.notes: Fire for shrines, shock for Ruta + fighting stuff. Technically only need less than 10 fire arrows, but just in case

Ride sand seal .dir(SW).notes: [The Perfect Drink] Shrine Quest. There should be a small mountain

Thunderblight.notes: Stasis, GEB 2 body 3 head. (bomb self after exiting beast in case ragdoll glitch fails)

_Shrine::KetohWawai.notes: Back up ancient core here if you only have 1

_Npc<Pumpkin Man>.notes: It should be evening in which case you would meet him at the bridge with fireflies (the lower one). During day time he will be working in the pumpkin field.

_Snap::Quest<Blupee>.notes: If it doesn't spawn, just skip this one and snap another later in Akkala

Enter Fish Drama.notes: [Reach Zora's Domain] Main Quest and [Divine Beast Vah Ruta] Main Quest

Ruta: (==) TOD here should be before 7AM. If you mess up too much it will be after 7AM, in which case it will be better to do diving quest first, then fronk (at pillar), then WB to shrine from fronk, and do lynel lady on second visit

_Npc<Letter Quest>.notes: Pick up the letter and walk along the passage. Can pick up 2 frogs here too. Then continue walking to a tree to blss

_Shrine::SohKofi.notes: Can get a Knight's Bow for Eldin if needed. Drop swallow bow if you don't have a slot.

Kill .enemy(Octorok).notes: Get Octoballoon. Not guaranteed, 84%. We do the shrine so that it's less time loss to rng

Ruta: (==) Check TOD 12pm-3pm. Make noon if not. For Balloon Girl (7AM-8PM), Darner Girl (8AM-8PM) and Greyson (>9PM). If it's after 3PM, it will be really tight to make it for Darner Girl, and if you set TOD at darner girl, you have to set TOD again for Greyson. So just setting it once here is better.

_Shrine::NamikaOzz.notes: Eat ATK 3, stasis + 4AA headshots with GEB. Snap. Grab axe and Frostspear in chest

.gale() + BLSS .dir(E).notes: Can skip gale here and save for Gut Check

_Npc<Shrine Painting Guy>.notes: [A Landscape of a Stable] Shrine Quest

_Npc<Darner Quest>.notes: [Little Sister's Big Request] Side Quest. Talk to big sister (2nd option), then little sister, big sister, little sister, big sister

.dir(S) + .dir(S).notes: 2 cardinal max heights from the statue

_Npc<Greyson>.notes: Should be night time already. If not, make night

_Tod::Night.notes: For Kilton + Xenoblade (<3AM) and East Akkala Stable (>5AM). If you are slow, you can set this before the Igneo Talus to make sure you meet the cycle for xenoblade chest

_Npc<Gut Check Goron>.notes: [The Gut Check Challenge] Shrine Quest. 2 WB up to the final 5 red rupees. You can either eat stam food or get one of the red rupees up there first and drop down

Activate Zuna Kai.notes: Activate the shrine here so you don't reach the chest too fast. The stal moblins will spawn faster and mess you up.

_Snap::Quest<Kilton>.notes: Snap multiple to be safe. Don't have to talk

_Snap::Quest<Skywatcher>.notes: Snap right after coming out of the shrine

Kill .enemy(Lynel).notes: Eat attack food, headshot with shock arrows, spin to win with RGC, If you ate a stam food for gorae torr, you should have enough stam

_Snap::Quest<Big Sword>.notes: You can snap from where the lynel was. Snap the hilt

_Material<Farosh Scale>.notes: Shoot Farosh after snapping the sword. Then updraft up. If the scale falls on your side, drop down, get it, then windbomb from the valley. If it falls on the other side, quick midair to the other side

.dir(S>>) + .dir(S.) Turn.notes: WB to far set of torches. 3 furies (this will kill the molduga near the shrine), light torches, SQ WB to the other set, light torches

_Npc<Secret Club>.notes: [The Secret Club's Secret] Side Quest. Walk in to trigger the cutscene

_Npc::Gerudo<Molduga Guts Lady>.notes: [Medicinal Molduga] Side Quest. If after 2PM, she will be in front of Riju's palace

_Npc::Gerudo<Riju>.notes: Finish [The Thunder Helm]. Talk to Riju not Thunderhelm

_Npc<Watchtower Guy>.notes: [The Eye of the Sandstorm] Shrine Quest

Equip flamebreaker.notes: Need to take off gerudo outfit to talk to Rhondson / Mipha's Grace for eventide later

_Tod::Noon.notes: You can delay this according to your speed. Here's optimal because you can use the cooking pot.

SQ .dir(NE).notes: Aim right in the middle of 2 trees

.dir(E>) Turn + .dir(E).notes: Land on northmost statue with ball

_Npc<Journal>.notes: [Secret of the Snowy Peaks] Shrine Quest

Ride to Mounted Archery Camp.notes: Switch to AA, kill any electric keese coming your way

_Npc<Standing Guy at Camp>.notes: [Hunt for the Giant Horse] Side Quest

_Tod::Morning.notes: For Highland Stable (>5AM), Lakeside Stable (>7AM), and Lurelin (5AM-6PM). You can make it after killing the bokos after Kao Makagh if you are slower.

.dir(N) Turn kill .enemy(Bokos).notes: AA 5 of them with falcon bow

Bomb arrow grass + .dir(<S).notes: Cut the near by tree if rain

_Npc<Old Lady>.notes: [The Horseback Hoodlums] Side Quest. He is at the horses, or inside if raining

_Npc<Quest Lady>.notes: [Thunder Magnet] Side Quest. She will be inside if thundering (5PM-9PM). You can still use bomb arrow for the shrine in rain if you stand below a tree

_Npc<Love Quest Guy>.notes: [A Gift of Nightshade] Side Quest. Use a cryo block when going to the woman

.fury() the camp.notes: For watch tower bokos left after fury, get BLS first, then AA him (aim at branch above with falcon bow) and WALK to get slide (if you slide directly in bow animation, your angle will be locked)

_Chest<Sapphire/Tolaz>.notes: Get either one on the side

_Npc<Old Man>.notes: [Sunken Treasure] Side Quest. On left dock or inside house if raining

_Npc<Dad>.notes: [Take Back the Sea] Side Quest. He will be inside house if rain. 5PM-6PM he is at the same place with mom. There's no good wb spot here, so you still want to go down and cryo block if he is at dinner

_Npc<Guy at Monument>.notes: [A Fragmented Monument] Shrine Quest. Talk twice then crouch on pedestal

.fury() camp + AA.notes: AA 2 bokos that don't die from 1 fury. Make sure chest unlocks

Smuggle.notes: Smuggle royal claymore, FDB, arrow (ancient OK), shield,. Drop shield before putting in last orb

_Equipment::Weapon<Drillshaft>.notes: Destroy the lizal shield if you still have it, or just throw a bomb

_Npc::Goron<Digging Goron>.notes: Talk to him, wb .dir(SW) to rock, golden gautlet rock up. UNEQUIP WOODEN BOW

Enter Rudania.notes: AA everything. Pick up 3 screws. For the hard moving ones, stasis them and shoot. Make sure falcon bow is not broken, because we need it for Sheem Dagoze

SQ .dir(NE) to talus quest.notes: GC quests 8AM - 8PM. Make noon if not

Korok Forest: (==) Oaki takes 5m20s of gameplay time to walk to shrine. Take note of your speed timer, subtract 5m20s so you know when Oaki is at the shrine

+_Npc<Watson>.notes: [Riddles of Hyrule] Side Quest. Talk first to wake up, then drop Apple, Sunshroom, Voltfin, Pumpkin, Hoof and talk again.

+Activate Keo Ruug.notes: Can get 1-2 frogs here and on the other side before pulling MS

Equip Guardian Axe.notes: When you pull MS, the equipped weapon will get 40 durability. Fire rod also works if you are slow and need to set extra TODs

_Shrine::DaagChokah.notes: Can approach Oaki after "Woo! I finally made it!"

.dir(SW) Super.notes: Ideally super directly to the quest korok. If you missed the super or have to land in the forest, do a <E wb

.dir(S>) + .dir(<W) Turn midair.notes: If you already have raw meat, use gale here and midair. Skip the mountain goats later

.dir(<E) Turn + BLSS .dir(N).notes: If you somehow didn't get 3 screws from yunobo escort, kill a stalker at central hyrule

_Npc<Flower Lady>.notes: [Watch Out for the Flowers] Shrine Quest. Faster to run to her and talk

.!!(EQUIP RGC).notes: It's faster to talk to the girl later with rgc already equipped

_Tod::Night.notes: For Xenoblade and potentially skip BM at Ya Naga (should not happen if you are fast enough). If it's after 7PM you don't need to make night

Kill .enemy(Moblin).notes: Throw RGC at him, fall damage cancel by switching to korok leaf. bomb the tree before picking up moblin club

_Npc::ZoraFemale<Fronk's Wife>.notes: Finish A Wife Washed Away Quest

_Tod::Noon.notes: Timing for Bareeda Naag is slightly tight

_Warp::VahMedoh.notes: Coordinates in rito might not be accurate

_Npc::Rito<Guard>.notes: [Face the Frost Talus] Side Quest. Near first bridge

_Npc<Old Man>.notes: [Curry for What Ails You] Side Quest

_Npc<Apple Lady>.notes: [The Apple of My Eye] Side Quest

_Npc::Rito<Shrine Little Bird>.notes: [The Bird in the Mountains] Shrine Quest

_Shrine::VooLota.notes: Start from 4 and blow every other hole while turning to the right. Make sure pedestal is blue after first blow

.dir(S) + .dir(<S).notes: Side wind is very strong. Do not recommend midair

Rito: (==) If it's already after 8PM, do BM shrine first

_Npc<Fairy Fountain Guy>.notes: [A Gift for the Great Fairy] Side Quest

.dir(<<E) TS to red orb.notes: [Trial of Thunder] Shrine Quest. Equip Guardian Axe + Forest Dweller Shield. 6 Hits on red and orange orbs

_Npc<Mom>.notes: [A Parent's Love] Side Quest. Give cake

BLSS .dir(<N).notes: Jump over fence to the right and BLSS off the fence

_Npc::ZoraMale<Luminous Stone Guy>.notes: [Luminous Stone Gathering] Side Quest. The guy is working on a pillar near entrance

_Npc::ZoraMale<Diving Quest>.notes: Finish Diving is a Beauty Quest

_Npc::ZoraFemale<Hinox Lady>.notes: [The Giant of Ralis Pond] Side Quest.

Zora's Domain: All the way at the back

.dir(N) Turn to Tarrey Town.notes: This time he is by Rhonson

Kakariko: (==) It is recommended that you learn from a vod for kak quests

_Warp::Shrine::TalohNaeg.notes: Need to be not raining for Koko. Make noon until it's not raining

+.dir(<W) To cucoo by shrine.notes: play tag with cottla, 3 cucoos, talk to pikango, Koko, make night

_Npc::SheikaMale<Koko>.notes: [Koko's Kitchen] [Cooking with Koko] [Koko Cuisine] [Koko's Specialty] Side Quests

_Tod::Night.notes: For the night cucoo + firefly. Cannot be raining or there won't be fireflies

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Arrow Quest Lady>.notes: Finish Arrows of Burning Heart Quest

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Firefly Lady>.notes: [By Firefly's Light] Side Quest. Grab 5 fireflies as you run toward the house, make sure don't scare her. talk twice, drop fireflies. If you scared her, make sure to let her sit down before talking again.

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Impa>.notes: Finish Free the Divine Beasts Quest

Walk + .gale() to shrine.notes: Make sure to finish shrine by 10:00PM.

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveller Sword>.notes: Mag from waterfall by entrance. Meanwhile, make sure you stay close to Dorian and keep him in view

Follow Dorian.notes: Can approach Dorian after "Show yourself!". Make sure you have empty slot. GEB Fire Arrow Head x2. The windcleaver might despawn after the cutscene so make sure to pick it up

_Npc<Doctor>.notes: [The Cursed Statue] Shrine Quest. If it's raining after making noon, reload the autosave you got after making noon.

.dir(<W) Turn + .dir(S>) Turn.notes: You can make this in 1 windbomb, but it's really hard + wind is really annoying here

Hateno: (==) If not 8AM-8PM, make noon. Alaos make it not raining

SQ to Bolson.notes: Aim left of house, where bolson is approximately at

_Npc<Lady at Deck>.notes: [Secret of the Cedars] Shrine Quest. Cannot do this quest when raining

_Npc<Cricket Guy>.notes: [A Gift for My Beloved] Side Quest
Finish A Gift for My Beloved Quest

_Shrine::JitanSami.notes: You don't need to free Naydra for the quest

BLSS + .dir(W>).notes: Can also WB, but wind is annoying

_Warp::Shrine::ShadaNaw.notes: Should be night already, make night if earlier than 8:20pm

.dir(S) + .dir(S) + .dir(E).notes: To mountain top. Can gale if needed

Look Sky .dir(S).notes: Make sure shooting star hits ground before going to shrine

Snowball throw + Stasis MAX.notes: Throw snowball up hill and let it roll almost all the way down

.dir(<<E) Turn to stable.notes: Glide to a rock to the left for a better angle

_Npc<3 People>.notes: [Leviathan Bones] Side Quest. Talk to any of 3, then talk once to each

_Shrine::RonaKachta.notes: [A Gift from the Monks] Side Quest

Acorn BLSS to castle.notes: Same as AMQ. Want to start south, then wiggle toward castle

Get Skew Bounce.notes: Can also just kill him normally
